title: 逻辑问题
author: xiaowei233v
txt_content:
想做成一个能在操方块上自动铺红石线的效果 最后搞得实体指数型爆炸崩端 
请大佬帮忙看看 = =命令（纯手打 估计有语法错误XD）
/execute as @e[type=minecraft:armor_stand,nbt={OnGround:1b}] at @s if block ~ ~-1 ~ grass_block run setblock ~ ~ ~ redstone_wire
/execute as @e[type=minecraft:armor_stand,nbt={OnGround:1b}] at @s run summon minecraft:armor_stand ~1 257 ~1
/execute as @e[type=minecraft:armor_stand,nbt={OnGround:1b}] at @s run summon minecraft:armor_stand ~1 257 ~-1
/execute as @e[type=minecraft:armor_stand,nbt={OnGround:1b}] at @s run summon minecraft:armor_stand ~-1 257 ~1
/execute as @e[type=minecraft:armor_stand,nbt={OnGround:1b}] at @s run summon minecraft:armor_stand ~-1 257 ~-1
/kill @e[type=armor_stand,nbt={OnGround:1b}]复制代码其中01是RCB
02,03,04,05是CCB 条件制约
06s是CCB 普通
还是炸了
在3x3的草方块实验上，最终有16个盔甲架
在5x5 最终有64个盔甲架
7x7 256
以此类推 据判断应该是 有重叠的盔甲架
如3x3试验块 最后盔甲架个数向中心递增
1  2  1
2  4  2
1  2  4
不知道有什么算法能解决= =

replies.author: ⊙u⊙
replies.txt_content:
最简单的办法，写上生成条件

execute as @e[type=armor_stand,nbt={OnGround:1b}] at @s positioned ~1 257 ~1 unless entity @e[type=armor_stand,limit=1,distance=..0.1] run summon minecraft:armor_stand ~ ~ ~
